last_episode_to_air.name: Mama's Boy
last_episode_to_air.overview: Big Gus gives a birthday girl the perfect present; an attempt to amp up a musician's old mistake; covering up a "horri-bull" tattoo.

name: Tattoo Nightmares
overview: Tattoo Nightmares is an American docu-reality series taking a closer look at “tattastrophies” and the genius work of cover-up artists who fix them. Tommy Helm, Big Gus and Jasmine Rodriguez are among the most revered cover-up artists in the business, and they employ their years of experience to undo their client’s ill-conceived tats. Watch as they work their magic and turn “disasterpieces” into new works of art.

episodes.name: Killer Skyline
episodes.overview: Gus tackles a horrible L.A skyline tattoo but the pain is too much for his client, Tommy covers a pot leaf that’s ruining a guy’s job prospects, and Jasmine tries to give her client his swag back by inking over an ex’s portrait.

episodes.name: Dragon Slayer
episodes.overview: Gus attempts to cover a dragon tramp stamp that’s ruining the client’s sex life, Tommy runs into a complicated fix of a man’s belly button tattoo, and Jasmine has the weight of an emotional Marine riding on her tattoo overhaul.

episodes.name: Pinup Problems
episodes.overview: Jasmine tries to cover a tattoo prank of tribal flames; Gus attempts a full back piece; Tommy has trouble with a super-fan.

episodes.name: Butt Pirate
episodes.overview: A client wants a mistake made in Las Vegas transformed into a pirate masterpiece in the premiere of this reality show, which challenges three talented cover-up artists to fix really bad tattoos. Also: Parrots are morphed into parents; and a tribal design gets reworked.

episodes.name: Teabag Tattoo
episodes.overview: Jasmine has second thoughts about agreeing to a cover-up on a personal area of a personal trainer; Tommy covers up a slangy, off-color acronym on a woman's back.

episodes.name: Burn Baby Burn
episodes.overview: Jasmine is shocked when her client reveals a burning American flag tattoo that he wants covered. Gus struggles to cover up a rockers biggest tribal embarrassment. Tommy’s client wants a cover up of a tattoo that almost cost him his life.

episodes.name: Don't Call It a Tramp Stamp
episodes.overview: Big Gus works on putting a young mother's criminal past behind her, while Jasmine deals with a client's horrible tribal sign.

episodes.name: Tribute Trouble
episodes.overview: Big Gus handles a tribute to a man's ex-wife; Tommy deals with a guy with the wrong initials on his chest.

episodes.name: Satanic Schoolgirl
episodes.overview: Tommy tries to save a Catholic schoolgirl with a pentagram on her back, Gus takes on a shockingly obscene tattoo across a gangster’s stomach & Jasmine attempts to resurrect a nerd’s life with a “meow” tattoo on his butt.

episodes.name: Starfish Booty
episodes.overview: Tommy tackles bare cartoon breasts on a man’s shoulder. Jasmine is caught off guard by a racist tattoo on a country boys arm and Gus struggles to keep cool while covering up a flower inside a girl’s butt crack.

episodes.name: Unholy Cross
episodes.overview: Tommy goes up against a cross made of penises on a man’s chest, Jasmine struggles with a girl who was horribly wronged by her friend & Gus takes on the shop’s first & most extreme head tattoo to come through the door.

episodes.name: Tattoo Secrets
episodes.overview: Jasmine is shocked by a client who reveals a heart wrenching secret to his wife, Tommy tackles the story of a girl betrayed by her own parents and Gus takes on the shop’s wildest cover up yet: 8 nipples on a man’s chest.

episodes.name: Good Girl Gone Bad
episodes.overview: A seemingly innocent suburban girl shows Gus a nasty "F**k the Police" tat, Jasmine tries to turn a horrific demon clown into an angel & Tommy attempts to mend a tattoo so bad it sent a client’s grandfather to his grave.

episodes.name: Behind the 8 Ball
episodes.overview: A softball coach with the words “Bitch Please” on his neck turns to Tommy for redemption, Gus tries to help a lady with an incriminating 8 ball & Jasmine’s client faces a tat so serious it could send him to the hospital.

episodes.name: Couples Therapy
episodes.overview: A quarreling couple needs Jasmine to erase the stains of their wild past, Tommy tries to help a mom with a horrifying skeleton that scares her son & Gus takes on a unicorn tattoo destroying his client’s fragile manhood.

episodes.name: Holy Hank!
episodes.overview: Gus attempts to rescue a boisterous girl from the grips of an evil vampire squid, Jasmine tries to help a confused man with a mixed up national identity & Tommy calls upon the saints to help cover a cop’s past failures.

episodes.name: Fire Crotch
episodes.overview: Gus takes a closer look at a forearm tattoo with some suspicious hidden images, Jasmine tries to extinguish a real-life fire crotch, and Tommy tries to lift the burden of a client’s childhood mistakes.

episodes.name: Pony Boy
episodes.overview: Jasmine ponies up for the only cop on the force with a cute tattoo, Tommy buries a banner & a horrible nickname at the same time, & Gus finds out that not every cover up is served with whipped cream and a cherry on top.

episodes.name: Rib Shots and Breast-aurants
episodes.overview: Jasmine’s tough guy client turns soft when she hits his ribs, Gus has his hands full with a busty pin-up girl, and Tommy takes on Tattoo...

episodes.name: Needle Phobia!
episodes.overview: Gus pokes holes in his clients debilitating needle phobia, Tommy takes on the literal scars left by blind love and Jasmine hears the story of a...

episodes.name: I Do's and Bad Tattoos
episodes.overview: Jasmine struggles to free her client from the pain of his jailhouse past.

episodes.name: All In
episodes.overview: Jasmine helps a very distraught client; Tommy is caught off guard by two lizards; Gus goes all in for a gambler with a stranger's face tattooed on his arm.

episodes.name: The Scrambler
episodes.overview: Gus scrambles to help a man cover a tragic memory; Jasmine works on an unlucky tattoo; Tommy cleans up after a con artist.

episodes.name: Jumping the Gun
episodes.overview: Jasmine attempts to exorcize an Irish curse that left her client writhing on the side of the road. Tommy tries to erase the scars left behind by a con-man & Gus reaches out to a man shaken by a disturbing carnival tragedy.

episodes.name: Ink Disasters
episodes.overview: Tommy gets a final shot at redemption with Bradley from "Ink Master"; Gus takes on a scarred butterfly; and Jasmine tries to uncover a soldier's secret.

episodes.name: Big Norma's House
episodes.overview: Gus does his best to clean up an unintentional dragon sperm tattoo, Jasmine learns first hand what happens when white rapping goes wrong, and Tommy helps soothe the wounds left behind by a national tragedy.

episodes.name: Welcome to Miami
episodes.overview: Tommy works on a piece that has shamed his clients family. Gus helps out a musician. Jasmine has to help out a superhero fan's phallic mistake.

episodes.name: Call 911!
episodes.overview: Tattoo Nightmares: Miami; a client's health takes a turn for the worse; Clint faces a fellow Texan's request; one father's poor choice offends Reese.

episodes.name: Chicaglow
episodes.overview: Tattoo Nightmares: Miami; Reese's client drops to his knees; Clint takes a bite out of a client's back tattoo; High Noon gets an unusual request.

episodes.name: Birth Marks the Spot
episodes.overview: Tattoo Nightmares: Miami; High Noon tackles his largest cover up yet; something that has marked Clint's client since birth and Reese helps a sex educator get her sexy back.

episodes.name: Doggie Style
episodes.overview: Jasmine rescues a former 90's beach babe, whose bad ink is drowning her career, Big Gus' client is eager to drop his pants to change his game.

episodes.name: Baywatch Bimbo!
episodes.overview: A former 90's beach babe whose bad ink is drowning her career; a client who is eager to drop his pants; a father honors his son.

episodes.name: U-F-OH NO!!
episodes.overview: Jasmine attempts a major touch-up on an unfortunate celebrity portrait, Big Gus signs up to help a client get rid of the wrong number, and Tommy has flashbacks when an ex-raver begs him to cover-up a past alien encounter.

episodes.name: No One's Bitch
episodes.overview: Gus helps a mother wanting to leave her bad-ass days behind; Jasmine's client is ready to grow up and stop being a baby; Tommy takes a stab at the ink that's been haunting his client for 13 years.

episodes.name: Get Off My Trunk!
episodes.overview: Jasmine helps a client with their massive mistake; Gus erases the memory of a client's son; Tommy breaks his client's cursed tattoo gamble.

episodes.name: What Would Jasmine Do
episodes.overview: Jasmine is faced with a Bible Belt blooper; Big Gus helps a father hit a home-run; a woman's mystical mishap.

episodes.name: Back in the Saddle
episodes.overview: Tommy works to try and cover up sidewalk-chalk inspired ink; Big Gus helps reset a gamer's tattoo from a bet; Jasmine helps a client recover from an online dating catastrophe.

episodes.name: Surfari
episodes.overview: A surfer hopes to wash away a mistake to win back his father; an accident-prone paramedic; getting rid of ink in time for an important reunion.

episodes.name: Friends Don't Let Friends Tattoo
episodes.overview: A client's crazy past; a mother's need for a classy new look; Tommy is challenged with his coworker's cover-up.

episodes.name: Broke and Branded
episodes.overview: A beauty expert's beast of a tattoo; a couple hoping to strip away a past mistake; Tommy works to kill some bad ink.

episodes.name: Merry Inkmas
episodes.overview: Gus ties his client's new ink up with a bow; Tommy tries to freeze out a man's yuletide eggnog disaster; a tough guy drops his drawers hoping for a new Christmas package.

episodes.name: Butt of the Joke
episodes.overview: A disgraced basketball fan; new ink for a hunter; a client hopes to fight back against a nasty little devil.

episodes.name: Bad Luck of the Irish
episodes.overview: A badly scarred man tearfully asks for Jasmine's help; a client wants to loose her best friend who has been following behind her for years; a man needs help to change his luck.

episodes.name: Father Doesn't Know Best
episodes.overview: A cycling fanatic comes to Jasmine hoping to rebuild his patriotism, while Tommy helps a disappointed daughter mask a swap meet mistake, and Big Gus fights a tricky tattoo, and has to switch up his game mid-stride.

episodes.name: Father Doesn't Know Best
episodes.overview: A cycling fan wishing to rebuild his patriotism; a disappointed daughter's swap meet mistake; BIg Gus fights a tricky tattoo, being forced to switch up his game mid-stride.

episodes.name: Friends Don't Let Friends Tattoo
episodes.overview: Gus takes on a client's past; Jasmine relates to a mother's need for a classy new look; Tommy is challenged with a coworker's cover-up.

episodes.name: Hashtag Horrible
episodes.overview: A client drops his pants in front of Jasmine; Gus tackles a goofy tattoo that's destroyed a family; Tommy tries to give a client's ink a second life.

episodes.name: The Ink Panther
episodes.overview: Big Gus helps a bartender; Jasmine empowers her client with a cover-up of a dating disaster; an arm-wrestling champ seeks some new ink from Tommy.

episodes.name: Fl(ex) Wives
episodes.overview: A bodybuilder visits Gus for a lift of his spirits; Jasmine helps a father get rid of some bad ink; and Tommy works on a stripper's tattoo.

episodes.name: Mermaids, Goblins and Snakes. Oh My!
episodes.overview: asmine gets suspicious of her client's mermaid mistake; Tommy takes on the result of a painful incident; and Big Gus encounters a client's green creature sidekick.

episodes.name: Mama's Boy
episodes.overview: Big Gus gives a birthday girl the perfect present; an attempt to amp up a musician's old mistake; covering up a "horri-bull" tattoo.
